title: plat 4 MiD Laner LF Serious And active team
body:
Hey guys im elfdonald

I am a plat mid main atm trying to rise the ranks to diamond but am looking for a serious team who is active and develop as a team and play more then 5 games then not play at all. i communicate very well and can help with team comps and shot calling. i am a confident player and believe in my skills and also improving everytime. i am kinda looking for a team plat++ but if any lower promising i could be interested. add me in game if interested or leave a comment and ill get back to you.
